brainly_data.question: restarted my computer and when it turned back on all my games and even my google play app was deleated and i dont know how to get it back. i already looked up how to install it but they all say android and i need windows 10 please help
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.question: restarted my computer and when it turned back on all my games and even my google play app was deleated and i dont know how to get it back. i already looked up how to install it but they all say android and i need windows 10 please help
all_answers.subject: Computers and technology
all_answers.text: If I were you I would try to install the free version of windows ten then go on with android's instructions.
